statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id = '123';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '456' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id = 'a1c7f840-9def-4f72-82c4-4229d2de4f02'
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC, feedback_date ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM ProductInformation;
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, category, launch_date FROM ProductInformation ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductInformation WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 3 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM ProductInformation ORDER BY category;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM ProductInformation WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, rating, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE launch_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 5 AND product_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_rating > 20;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_description LIKE '%great%';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_history ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC, feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_description FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NULL;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT f.feedback_id, f.feedback_date, f.feedback_text, fh.feedback_rating FROM feedback f JOIN feedback_history fh ON f.feedback_id = fh.feedback_id WHERE fh.feedback_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, product_id, rating, feedback FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT p.name, c.name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT p.name, p.price, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON c.id = pc.category_id;
SELECT r.rating, r.feedback, p.name AS product_name, c.name AS customer_name FROM reviews r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.id JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.id;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, COUNT(r.id) AS number_of_reviews FROM customers c LEFT JOIN reviews r ON c.id = r.customer_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY number_of_reviews DESC;
